Webhosting UK Com Ltd. (WHUK), a renowned web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offers professional grade web hosting service over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facility.

★★ Shared Hosting ★★
WHUK offers shared hosting services on Cloud platform. Included with the package is one domain registration or transfer FREE!

Web Hosting Plans Configuration:

Up to 40GB SSD Storage
Unmetered Bandwidth
Host Unlimited Websites
Unlimited Emails
Unlimited Databases
cPanel and Plesk Control Panel
FREE Domain on annual plan
24x7 Technical Support
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
Starts from only £2.49 GBP ex. VAT

For full list of cPanel Hosting Packages, visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/cpanel-hosting/

For full list of Windows Hosting Packages, visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/windows-hosting/

★★ WordPress Hosting ★★
Our WordPress Hosting plans make it simple and easy for you to setup your own blog or website with everything needed to get started right away. Every plan comes with WordPress preinstalled - a powerful, easy to use blogging and content management system that powers millions of websites around the world!

Advantages:
1. 24x7 Managed Service at no extra cost
2. Pre-installed WordPress
3. Pre-installed Plugins
4. Free Installation of additional plugins
5. Free Migration & Transfer
6. Free Daily Backups with 7 days Retention
7. Auto Updates
8. Memcache Enabled
9. Varnish Cache and Nginx

WordPress Hosting Plans Configuration:

Up to 20GB SSD Storage
Unlimited Bandwidth
Host Up to 15 WordPress Sites
Unlimited Emails*
FREE Domain Name*
24x7 Technical Support
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
Starts from only £3.33 GBP ex. VAT

For more details about the offers visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/wordpress-hosting/

Use Discount Coupon - "SCARY50" to get 50% OFF on All Shared Hosting and WordPress Hosting Plans.

★★ Dedicated Servers ★★
WHUK's Intel® Xeon® E3 and E5 series Managed Dedicated Servers are industry leading servers built to deliver optimum performance to any website. Get Free Plesk Web Pro and Free Server Monitoring with any of the below servers. We have been delivering the ultimate dedicated hosting solutions with Enterprise Quality Server Hardware and Exuberant Support since 2001.

Dedicated Servers Configuration:

Intel Xeon E3 Series
CPU Cores/Threads - 4 Cores/ 8 Threads
Up to 64GB DDR4 RAM
Up to 2 TB HDD Storage
Up to 1 TB Performance SSD Storage
Port Speed - 1 Gbit
Monthly Bandwidth - 10 TB
Free Server Monitoring Plan
Starts from only £69.99 GBP ex. VAT

Intel Xeon E5 Series
CPU Cores/Threads - UP to 20 Cores/ 40 Threads
Up to 512GB DDR4 RAM
Up to 4 TB HDD Storage
Up to 4 x 240 GB Performance SSD Storage
Port Speed - 1 Gbit
UP to 30TB Monthly Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address
Free Server Monitoring Plan
Starts from only £189.99 GBP ex. VAT

To know more about Dedicated Servers features, visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/dedicated-servers/

★★ VPS Hosting ★★
With our latest promo on VPS Hosting, our entire range of plans have evolved into more affordable and value for money proposition! Here's what you can avail through the latest promotion.

VPS Hosting Plans Configuration:
Up to 6 vCPU Cores
Up to 240 GB SSD Storage
Up to 8 GB DDR4 RAM
Unlimited Bandwidth
1 Free IP Address
Free 24x7 Premium Support, Fully Managed
cPanel or Plesk Onyx for Linux
FREE Plesk Onyx Admin for Windows
Starts from only £12.99 GBP ex. VAT

For full list of Linux VPS Hosting features, visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/linux-vps/

For full list of Windows VPS Hosting features, visit: https://www.webhosting.uk.com/windows-vps/

WHUK offers with uninterrupted customer support and 99.95% uptime guarantee along with ensuring the speed and smooth functioning of the website even during the high traffic times. These all types of hosting packages are the best solutions for small and medium businesses. With all the features mentioned above and 24/7 pro-active monitoring, the shared hosting platform provided by WHUK is a complete value for money.

In case of any questions, you can approach our Sales Department through 24*7 Live chat, you can drop us an email at sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on the toll free number 0808-862-0890 / +44-191-303-8069.
